      • update

        public void update(java.lang.String info,
                   java.awt.Color color,
                   int type)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method to be called by Observable's notifyObservers method.
        参数:
        info - the information from the notify
        color - the color passed by the notifyObservers method.
        type - the type passed by the notifyObservers method.
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - remote error

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable obs,
                   int current,
                   int type)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method to be called by Observable's notifyObservers method.
        参数:
        obs - the observable object
        current - the current argument passed by the notifyObservers method.
        type - the type number of passed by the notifyObservers method.
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - remote error
